attributes.action: bring back Britain's canal system for use by hauliers to ease pressure on the roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain's roads are seriously overcrowded. By reintroducing canals the government will be able to cut the number of HGV's on the roads which will ease congestion and traffic incidents. This also has the advantage in that greenhouse emmissions will be reduced by using barges not lorries.
